TopicTitle: You know you're addicted to KSP when...

Articles.Content:
I fear this terrible affliction has hit many of you. Come, share your stories.

I work out new craft whilst in work. I sit face to face with patients and have been known to throw the word 'rocket' into my consultation at random, inappropriate times. Whoops.
Looking at a screenshot of the game and I find myself trying to click the light button to better see the rocket.
when i am F5~ing the forum
...you make another "you know you're addicted to KSP when..." thread.
KSP makes Minecraft look boring, and causes you to resign from being a Moderator of a server there. (true story)

KSP makes Minecraft look boring, and causes you to resign from being a Moderator of a server there. (true story)

I played Minecraft for a considerable amount of time before. Haven't set foot even once on their forums though...

I played Minecraft for a considerable amount of time before. Haven't set foot even once on their forums though...

I am think about joining minecraft forums
Trying to calculate how much delta v it takes to walk round a corner.

...you make another "you know you're addicted to KSP when..." thread.

...you notice that this thread's been made before (I actually came here to say that and laughed that someone had something similar )

KSP makes Minecraft look boring, and causes you to resign from being a Moderator of a server there. (true story)

I dropped off the face of Minecraft when I started playing KSP.
You know you're addicted to ksp when you calculate every step of your mission ahead of time like NASA
You're wondering why your water bottle isn't lifting itself and adding boosters to that bottle.
You know you're addicted to KSP when you post on this theard that you're addicted to KSP.

you know when you're addicted to KSP when you find that the chair your sitting in has a groove and your rushed to the hospital from dehydration caused by hours of gaming

Edit: actually when i mean by hours i mean days

Edited August 5, 2013 by Helix935
When you're playing other games and hold in the right mouse button to pan the camera around...
You know you're addicted to ksp when you talk about it in your sleep.
You know you are addicted when you are modding another game and you are searching for the gamedata folder

...you notice that this thread's been made before (I actually came here to say that and laughed that someone had something similar )

Notice this is the 4th thread with an identical title since march.

You know you're addicted to KSP when: You try to pan the camera while watching KSP youtube videos causing them to constantly pause.

You realize you're addicted when: You do it multiple times on the same video.

You accept you're addiction when: You give up on watching KSP videos and load up KSP to play instead.

You extend you're addiction when: You hook up a second monitor so you can watch KSP and play KSP at the same time.

-All true for me-
You know you're addicted when: You join the forums.
You know your addicted when the forums are the most visited site according to your chrome.
When the KSP forums is the first link when you say "K" in google
When you start to dream about it
When you start to use ponies as your space program's mascot.
You play the demo during study class.(on the bright side mun launch next week)
You stay up all night waiting for the release of the latest patch
